name: AddGAVotersTableIndexes
rule:
[
	[idx: 'Voters_Absentee_idx', name: 'Absentee'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistAName_idx', name: 'CityDistAName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistAValue_idx', name: 'CityDistAValue'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistBName_idx', name: 'CityDistBName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistBValue_idx', name: 'CityDistBValue'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistCName_idx', name: 'CityDistCName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistCValue_idx', name: 'CityDistCValue'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistDName_idx', name: 'CityDistDName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityDistDValue_idx', name: 'CityDistDValue'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CityPrecinctId_idx', name: 'CityPrecinctId'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CitySchoolDistName_idx', name: 'CitySchoolDistName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CitySchoolDist_idx', name: 'CitySchoolDist'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CommDistrict_idx', name: 'CommDistrict'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CongressionalDistrict_idx', name: 'CongressionalDistrict'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CountyCode_idx', name: 'CountyCode'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CountyDistAName_idx', name: 'CountyDistAName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CountyDistAValue_idx', name: 'CountyDistAValue'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CountyDistBName_idx', name: 'CountyDistBName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CountyDistBValue_idx', name: 'CountyDistBValue'],
	[idx: 'Voters_CountyPrecinctId_idx', name: 'CountyPrecinctId'],
	[idx: 'Voters_DateLastVotedDate_idx', name: 'DateLastVotedDate'],
	[idx: 'Voters_DateOfBirth_idx', name: 'DateOfBirth'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ExportDate_idx', name: 'ExportDate'],
	[idx: 'Voters_Gender_idx', name: 'Gender'],
	[idx: 'Voters_HouseDistrict_idx', name: 'HouseDistrict'],
	[idx: 'Voters_JudicialDistrict_idx', name: 'JudicialDistrict'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailAddress2_idx', name: 'MailAddress2'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailAddress3_idx', name: 'MailAddress3'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailAptUnitNbr_idx', name: 'MailAptUnitNbr'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailCity_idx', name: 'MailCity'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailCounty_idx', name: 'MailCounty'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailHouseNbr_idx', name: 'MailHouseNbr'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailState_idx', name: 'MailState'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailStreetName_idx', name: 'MailStreetName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailStreetSuffix_idx', name: 'MailStreetSuffix'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailZipPlus4_idx', name: 'MailZipPlus4'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MailZip_idx', name: 'MailZip'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MunicipalCode_idx', name: 'MunicipalCode'],
	[idx: 'Voters_MunicipalName_idx', name: 'MunicipalName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_PartyLastVoted_idx', name: 'PartyLastVoted'],
	[idx: 'Voters_Race_idx', name: 'Race'],
	[idx: 'Voters_RegistrationNbr_idx', name: 'RegistrationNbr'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResAptUnitNbr_idx', name: 'ResAptUnitNbr'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResCityName_idx', name: 'ResCityName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResHouseNbr_idx', name: 'ResHouseNbr'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResStreetName_idx', name: 'ResStreetName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResStreetSuffix_idx', name: 'ResStreetSuffix'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResZipPlus4_idx', name: 'ResZipPlus4'],
	[idx: 'Voters_ResZip_idx', name: 'ResZip'],
	[idx: 'Voters_SchoolDistrict_idx', name: 'SchoolDistrict'],
	[idx: 'Voters_SenateDistrict_idx', name: 'SenateDistrict'],
	[idx: 'Voters_TypeOfElection_idx', name: 'TypeOfElection'],
	[idx: 'Voters_VoterFirstName_idx', name: 'VoterFirstName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_VoterLastName_idx', name: 'VoterLastName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_VoterMiddleMaiden_idx', name: 'VoterMiddleMaiden'],
	[idx: 'Voters_VoterNameSuffix_idx', name: 'VoterNameSuffix'],
	[idx: 'Voters_VoterNameTitle_idx', name: 'VoterNameTitle'],
	[idx: 'Voters_VoterStatus_idx', name: 'VoterStatus'],
	[idx: 'Voters_WardCityCouncilName_idx', name: 'WardCityCouncilName'],
	[idx: 'Voters_WardCityCouncil_idx', name: 'WardCityCouncil']
].each { i ->
	if(sql.firstRow("""SELECT COUNT(*) AS "ExistCount" FROM pg_class WHERE relname = :indexName""",[indexName:i.idx]).ExistCount < 1) {
		sql.executeUpdate("""CREATE INDEX "${i.idx}" ON "Georgia"."Voters" USING btree ("${i.name}")""")
	}
}
